metadata.title: CVE-2019-2224 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-15140.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-15140. Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2019-15140 instead of this candidate. Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
